            11%
          }}%

          \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{footnote}%
          \DNparagraph{%
            Se{ }refiere{ }m{\'{a}}s{ }a{ }blogs{ }que{ }a{ }Tuenti/Facebook%
          }%
        }}}}%
        \let\DEVcurrentNfootnoteAauto=\relax%

        }}%
        \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{section}%
        \def\DEVcurrentNbulletlistAbullet{*}%
        \DNbulletlist{%
          \DECattr{}{bullet}{*}{bulletlist}{%
          \DECsetbullet{\labelitemi}%
          \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{bulletlist}%
          \DNlistitem{%
            \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{listitem}%
            \DNdefinitionlist{%
              \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{definitionlist}%
              \DNdefinitionlistitem{%
                \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{definitionlistitem}%
                \DNterm{%
                  Apunte:{ }no{ }todo{ }el{ }mundo{ }tiene{ }claro{ }quien{ }debe{ }realizar{ }la{ }programaci{\'{o}}n:%
                }%
                \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{definitionlistitem}%
                \DNdefinition{%
                  \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{definition}%
                  \def\DEVcurrentNbulletlistAbullet{*}%
                  \DNbulletlist{%
                    \DECattr{}{bullet}{*}{bulletlist}{%
                    \DECsetbullet{\labelitemii}%
                    \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{bulletlist}%
                    \DNlistitem{%
                      \renewcommand{\DEVparagraphindented}{false}%
                      \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{listitem}%
                      \DNparagraph{%
                        Reglamento{ }Org{\'{a}}nico{ }de{ }Institutos{ }de{ }Ense{\~{n}}anza{ }Secundaria{,}{ }articulo{ }51:{ }%
                        \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{paragraph}%
                        \DNemphasis{%
                          las{ }programaciones{ }deben{ }ser{ }redactadas{ }por{ }el{ }jefe{ }de{ }departamento%
                        }%
                      }%
                    }%
                    \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{bulletlist}%
                    \DNlistitem{%
                      \renewcommand{\DEVparagraphindented}{false}%
                      \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{listitem}%
                      \DNparagraph{%
                        Reglamento{ }Org{\'{a}}nico{ }de{ }Institutos{ }de{ }Ense{\~{n}}anza{ }Secundaria{,}{ }articulo{ }68.1:{ }%
                        \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{paragraph}%
                        \DNemphasis{%
                          cada{ }departamento{ }elaborar{\'{a}}{ }la{ }programaci{\'{o}}n{ }did{\'{a}}ctica{ }de{ }las{ }ense{\~{n}}anzas{ }que{ }tiene{ }encomendadas%
                        }%
                      }%
                    }%
                    \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{bulletlist}%
                    \def\DEVcurrentNlistitemAlastitem{true}%
                    \DNlistitem{%
                      \DECattr{}{lastitem}{true}{listitem}{%
                      \renewcommand{\DEVparagraphindented}{false}%
                      \renewcommand{\DEVparent}{listitem}%
                      \DNparagraph{%
                        En{ }la{ }mayor{ }parte{ }de{ }institutos{ }el{ }encargado{ }de{ }hacer{ }las{ }programaciones{ }es{ }el{ }profesor{ }que{ }vaya{ }a{ }impartir{ }cada{ }materia.%
                      }%
                    }}%
                    \let\DEVcurrentNlistitemAlastitem=\relax%
                  }}%
                  \let\DEVcurrentNbulletlistAbullet=\relax%
                }%
              }%
            }%
          }%
        }}%
